name: wiki101SchemaERSToSchemas
heading: copy the schema of the wiki to 101 web
comment: Currently only the .ers format is provide but more schema languages will be added in the future

Wiki101ERSSchema.101worker/configs/Wiki101Schema.ers: The schema of the wiki expressed in the Entity Relationship Schema

Wiki101ERSSchemas[*].101web/dumps/Wiki101Schema.ers: The schema of the wiki expressed in the Entity Relationship Schema
